scripts.install: npm run install-backend & npm run install-frontend
scripts.install-backend: cd sys-src && cd backend && npm install
scripts.install-frontend: cd sys-src && cd frontend && npm install
scripts.start: npm run start-backend & npm run start-frontend
scripts.start-backend: cd sys-src && cd backend && npm start
scripts.start-frontend: cd sys-src && cd frontend && npm run dev
